channel.title: [pi]
channel.description:
I have a safe area but after awhile like 6-8 times of dieing your character removes 2-3 items and it's really annoying if you have full inventory
Can anyone help me try and fix this?

item.title: [pi]
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

Basically my Wilderness safe pvp area You kno when you die you keep all your items?

Well you keep all your items perfectly and after you die a few times maybe 5+ times it randomly takes 2 items of me like my whip and my chestplate.

And sometimes my players have ful inventory and lose their statius or ags or something.

Can anybody help me fix this ?

Read full topic
